briefdescription.para: Get preset flavor text for built-in preset.

detaileddescription.para: Returns world context text for the specified preset type. This text is included in prompts to guide LLM generation.

simplesect.para: Flavor text describing the world context

briefdescription.para: Get preset flavor text for custom preset.

detaileddescription.para: Returns world context text from a custom preset.

simplesect.para: Flavor text from the custom preset

memberdef.argsstring: (const FoodGenerateParams &params, PresetType preset, const std::set< std::string > &excludeIds=std::set< std::string >(), const std::string &modelName=std::string(), const std::string &generationTimestamp=std::string(), int existingCount=-1)
memberdef.name: BuildFoodJsonPrompt

briefdescription.para: Build food item generation prompt (built-in preset).

detaileddescription.para: Constructs a complete prompt for generating food items using a built-in preset. Includes context, constraints, examples, and JSON format instructions.

parameterdescription.para: Set of existing item IDs to avoid duplicates

memberdef.argsstring: (const FoodGenerateParams &params, const CustomPreset &customPreset, const std::set< std::string > &excludeIds=std::set< std::string >(), const std::string &modelName=std::string(), const std::string &generationTimestamp=std::string(), int existingCount=-1)

briefdescription.para: Build ammo item generation prompt (custom preset).
Static class for building LLM prompts.

detaileddescription.para: Constructs detailed prompts for LLM item generation, including context, constraints, examples, and formatting instructions. Supports all item types and both built-in and custom presets.
